ingredients: 2  eggs, beaten, 1 cup white sugar, 1 cup chopped dates, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 tablespoon butter, 3 cups crispy rice cereal, 1 cup flaked coconut
nutrition: Total Fat 2g 2%, Saturated Fat 1g 7%, Cholesterol 17mg 6%, Sodium 45mg 2%, Total Carbohydrate 18g 6%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 14g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 2mg 12%, Calcium 5mg 0%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 61mg 1%
